meaning: pour, irrigate, shed (tears), flow into, concentrate on, notes, comment, annotate

onyomiExamples.meaning: caution, being careful, attention (heed), warning, advice
accepting an order, receiving an order, orders received

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to pour (into), to sprinkle on (from above), to water (e.g. plants), to pour onto, to spray, to shed (tears), to concentrate one's energy (strength, attention, etc.) on, to devote to, to fix (one's eyes) on, to flow into (e.g. of a river), to run into, to drain into, to fall (of rain, snow), to pour down
to pour, to add (liquid), to serve (drinks), to put on (lipstick, etc.), to apply, to colour, to dye, to light (a fire), to burn
to pour (into a vessel), to fill (a cup, bowl, etc.) with, to dish out (food or drink)
